title: Utopia
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burritos, burgers, quesadilla, sandwiches, and brewed to order coffee. Meat-free items are marked with a "v," and vegans should specify no mayonaise, no cheese. You can ask for the grilled or crispy fried soy chicken for any of the quesadilla or burrito, or for a vegetarian burger patty for any of the burger. Weekend brunch.
